companyInfo.description: Customized Energy Solutions is a leading energy consulting firm that provides innovative solutions to energy challenges. They specialize in market operations, demand response, and energy storage solutions.

responsibilities: Write business requirements and acceptance criteria for integration projects.
Validate data flows and fixes using SQL in QA, UAT, and Production.
Coordinate with Billing, EDI, and Ops to resolve issues and improve processes.

companyInfo.description: NOIS Co., Ltd. is a technology company specializing in software development and IT solutions. They focus on delivering high-quality software products and services to clients worldwide.
companyInfo.address: 456 Tech Street, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

responsibilities: Started as an intern in ElasticSearch and NoSQL R&D, promoted to Developer in 2017 and Team Lead in 2018.
Collected requirements directly from international clients and delivered features and fixes.
Led a team of 6 to 8 developers focused on healthcare and aged care systems.
achievements: Led the development of a healthcare management system that improved patient care and operational efficiency.
